text: AS Cannes is a professional Volleyball team based in Cannes, France. It plays in Pro A and in the CEV Champions League ==Honours & achievements== ===Domestic competitions=== French League * Winners (9): 1981, 1982, 1983, 1986, 1990, 1991, 1994, 1995, 2005 * Runners up (1): 2004 French Cup * Winners (5): 1985, 1993, 1995, 1998, 2007 * Runners-up (1): 2006 French Supercup * Runners-up (1): 2005 ===European competitions=== CEV Champions League * Runners-up (1): 1982-83 CEV Top Teams Cup * Winners (1): 1998-99 * Runners-up (1): 1992-93 CEV Cup * Winners (1): 1980-81 ==Season 2007-2008== Coach : Laurent Tillie ; {| cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0" border="1" style="background: #f7f8ff; font-size: 95%; border: gray solid 1px; border- collapse: collapse;" |- style="background: #CCCCCC" |Number |Name |Height |Nationality |- | align="center" | 2 |Yannick BAZIN | align="center" | 1,90 | |- | align="center" | 3 |Gérald HARDY-DESSOURCES | align="center" | 1,97 | |- | align="center" | 4 |Vladislavs HOTULEVS | align="center" | 2,00 | |- | align="center" | 5 |Jean-François EXIGA | align="center" | 1,75 | |- | align="center" | 6 |Angel PEREZ | align="center" | 1,90 | |- | align="center" | 7 |Jérôme CORDA | align="center" | 1,96 | |- | align="center" | 8 |Guntars CELITANS | align="center" | 2,00 | |- | align="center" | 9 |Jeroen TROMMEL | align="center" | 1,94 | |- | align="center" | 10 |Philip SCHNEIDER | align="center" | 2,00 | |- | align="center" | 12 |Olli KUNNARI | align="center" | 1,96 | |- | align="center" | 14 |Evgueni TSVETKOV | align="center" | 2,01 | |- | align="center" | 15 |Jonathan RABAUD | align="center" | 1,90 | |- | align="center" | 16 |Rémy SICSIC | align="center" | 1,96 | |} ==Famous players== * Nicolas Maréchal * Pierre Pujol Category:French volleyball clubs Category:Sport in Cannes
